job_postings.title: Social Media Assistant
job_postings.description: As a Social Media Assistant, you will work closely with the social media manager or marketing team to execute social media strategies and campaigns. You will be responsible for assisting in the creation and scheduling of engaging content, monitoring social media channels, and interacting with followers.
responsibilities: Community engagement to ensure that is supported and actively represented online
Focus on social media content development and publication
Stay on top of trends on social media platforms, and suggest content ideas to the team
idealCandidate: Young (18-24 year old) Female social media manager
Passionate & Reliable: Genuine interest in our mission and a strong desire to make a positive impact; responsible, and committed to fulfilling volunteer commitments.

Adaptable, Team Player & Strong Communication Skills: Able to work effectively in diverse teams; flexible and open to embracing new challenges and shifting priorities; clear verbal and written communication, active listening, and constructive feedback.
Respectful: Embraces diversity, inclusive, and treats others with respect. Abides with all our rules and regulations.
job_postings.whenWhere: The onboarding event for this event will take place in Jan 18th, 2023 in AAU Auditorium

job_postings.title: Volunteer Teacher
job_postings.description: Support social media content and assist in community engagement initiatives for educational programs.
responsibilities: Assist classes and support community learning
Engage with parents and local community
job_postings.whenWhere: Weekly sessions at AAU Community Center

job_postings.title: Social Media Assistant
job_postings.description: Assist in content scheduling, monitor channels, and interact with followers to grow brand presence.
responsibilities: Schedule posts and assist with content planning
idealCandidate: Team player with eye for design
